active.effects: Removes all {{tip|crowd control}} debuffs (except {{tip|Airborne}}) from your champion and grants you {{tip|Cc-immune|total crowd control immunity}} for the next 3 seconds.

passives.name: Unanimity
passives.effects: Gain 15% of your teammate's {{as|attack damage}}, {{as|ability power}}, {{as|'''total''' attack speed}}, {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, {{as|armor}}, {{as|magic resistance}}, and {{as|ability haste}}, increased to 30% if they also have '''Twin Mask''' and are alive.

passives.name: Covering Fire
passives.effects: While your ally is within {{tt|1200 units|center-to-edge}}, your basic attacks [[on-hit]] generate a stack of ''Covering Fire''. At 1 stack, your next basic attack consumes them all to cause your ally to fire a bolt at the target, dealing {{as|{{pp|20 to 60}} physical damage}} and applying your ally's on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

passives.name: Reap
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] apply a ''Reap'' stack to the target, stacking infinitely and lasting for the remainder of the combat phase, and deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} equal to {{as|{{rd|{{fd|0.7}}%|{{fd|0.5}}%}} (+ {{fd|0.1}}% per target's ''Reap'' stack) of the target's '''maximum''' health}}. Additionally, the target is inflicted a [[Health#Health threshold|health threshold]] equal to {{as|100% of their '''maximum''' health}} minus the '''total''' amount of '''bonus''' damage dealt against them, lasting until the end of the round and capped at a threshold of {{as|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}.

passives.name: Sow
passives.effects: Increases the {{as|attack speed}} gained from all sources by 25%.

active.name: Unbreakable
active.effects: Gain a {{tip|shield}} for 300 {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' health)}} that decays over 5 seconds, and 25% increased [[size]] for the same duration.

passives.name: Soulrend
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] deals {{as|125 {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} and grants you {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers (10 second cooldown per champion).

passives.name: Sinister Pact
passives.effects: Increase your {{as|ability power}} by {{as|{{fd|1.5}}%|ap}} and gain {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for every {{as|100 '''current''' health}} you are missing, up to an increase of {{as|45% ability power}} and {{as|45% '''bonus''' movement speed}} at {{as|3000 '''current''' health}} missing.

passives.name: Safeguard
passives.effects: Become ''Safeguarded'' to reduce incoming champion damage by 40%, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from a champion (30 second cooldown, timer restarts upon taking damage from champions).

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|180% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|4%|2%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]], for a '''minimum''' of {{as|180% '''base''' AD}}. If the target is a champion, {{tip|heal}} for{{ft|{{as|{{ap|180*0.55}}% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{ap|4*0.55}}%|{{ap|2*0.55}}%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}|55% of the damage value}}({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).

active.name: Glaciate
active.effects: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|250|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 85% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies struck within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are {{tip|root|rooted}} for the same duration instead.

passives.name: Guiding Light
passives.effects: Upon casting your [[champion ability|ultimate]], you ''Transcend'' for 9 seconds. While ''Transcended'', increase your {{as|'''maximum''' health by {{fd|12.5}}%}} and cause you and all allies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units to {{tip|heal}} for {{as|{{fd|2.5}}% of your '''maximum''' health}} upon you ''Transcending'' and every 3 seconds thereafter, for a total healing of {{as|{{ap|2.5*4}}% of your '''maximum''' health}}.

active.name: Cloudburst II
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to the target location and fire three homing missiles at the {{tt|most wounded|Lowest health percent}} enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals {{as|{{pp|150/3 to 350/3|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|26.6{{recurring|6}}}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}}, for a total of {{as|{{pp|150 to 350|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type= target's '''missing''' health|color=health|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0 to 75 for 11|formula=5% per 7.5% of enemies' '''missing''' health}}.

passives.name: Nightstalker
passives.effects: Your abilities deal {{as|{{rd|{{pp|0 to 22.5 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}|{{pp|0 to 12.5 for 11|0 to 70|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|showtype=false}}}}|hp}} {{as|(based on target's '''missing''' health)}} increased damage against enemy champions. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them renders you {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invulnerable}} to non-structures for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, which ends prematurely if you perform an action that {{tip|break stealth|breaks stealth}}.

passives.name: Sandswipe
passives.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to 150 units beyond the {{tt|target enemy champion's location|At the end of the cast time.}}, and upon completing the dash, deal {{as|12% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to the target. You then deal 20% increased damage to the target for the next 3 seconds.

passives.name: Blur
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] reduce the remaining cooldowns of your abilities and spells with {{tip|dash|dashes}} and/or {{tip|blink|blinks}} by 12%, modified to 4% for your ultimate ability.

passives.name: Money In The Bank
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and ability hits have a 12% chance to store between {{g|30}} and {{as|240|gold}} ({{fd|2.5}}-second cooldown per attack/ability). If you win the round, gain {{g|gold}} equal to the stored amount, otherwise lose 25% of it.

passives.name: ZZ'Rot
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-attack]] and damaging abilities against enemies summon 8 allied {{ui|Voidmite|Voidmites}} that are {{tip|untargetable}} and attack the target (15 second cooldown). {{ui|Voidmite|Voidmites}} deal {{as|6|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 4% of your AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% of your AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} with each of their basic attacks and last for up to 3 seconds. Additionally, summon 6 {{ui|Voidmite|Voidmites}} upon your death.

passives.name: Scarlet Allegiance
passives.effects: If your {{stil|life steal}} and {{stil|omnivamp}} sum to at least 30%, gain {{as|500 '''bonus''' health}} and {{tip|heal}} yourself equal to 10% of the damage that enemy champions in a {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 525 units radius around you take from all sources.

passives.name: Fill the Soul
passives.effects: Gain a charge each time you or champions within 800 units cast an [[champion ability|ability]], up to 30. At maximum charges, gain {{as|{{pp|100 to 250}} ability power}} and {{as|{{pp|15 to 25|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for the rest of the round, as well as a {{pp|400 to 750}} {{tip|shield}} that lasts until destroyed. Charges are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

active.name: Vigilance
active.effects: {{tip|Dash}} to your ally, then grant yourself and the ally a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 100% of your AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of your '''bonus''' health)}} damage for 5 seconds. '''Can be used even while the ally is dead.'''

passives.name: Inner Flame
passives.effects:
Every 2 rounds, gain a random {{bi|Dragon Soul}}. Additionally, increase your '''total''' {{as|attack damage}}, {{as|ability power}}, {{as|attack speed}}, {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, {{as|armor}}, {{as|magic resistance}}, and {{as|ability haste}} by 4% for each {{bi|Dragon Soul}} you possess, up to 30% at maximum souls.

Once you have obtained all 6 {{bi|Dragon Soul|Dragon Souls}}, you also gain the {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} buff permanently at the next round interval. This buff counts as a soul for this effect, for a total stat increase of 35%.

passives.name: Anticipation
passives.effects: [[Basic attack]]s and [[Champion ability|basic ability]] casts generate 1 and 2 stacks of ''Anticipation'' for the rest of the round, respectively, stacking up to 40 times. For each stack, increase your ultimate ability's damage by 3% and gain 2 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]], up to 120% increased ultimate damage and 80 ultimate haste. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Helix
passives.effects: Dealing damage with an ability generates 30 ''Energize'' stacks and triggers the effects of {{tip|Energized}} attacks if they are ready ({{fd|2.5}}-second cooldown per {{tip|cast instance}}).

passives.name: Spiral Out
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack generates a ''Rune'' stack and fires a missile at the target for each ''Rune'' stack you have, dealing {{as|{{pp|20 to 45}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 11% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}} per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} with each missile. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

passives.name: Watch Them Fall
passives.effects: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion summons a comet above them that lands at their current location after 1 second, dealing {{as|{{pp|50 to 150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% of your '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area (6 second cooldown per target per {{tip|cast instance}}).

passives.name: Relentless
passives.effects: Casting an ability {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} your basic attack timer and empowers your next two basic attacks with {{as|90% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. Additionally, each basic attack [[on-attack]] reduces the cooldowns of all your abilities by {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

passives.name: Hack the Meat
passives.effects: Dealing damage reduces the target's {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resistance}} by 3 for 5 seconds, stacking up to 10 times for a total resistances reduction of 30. Stacks can be applied to each enemy only once every second.

passives.name: Cannibalize
passives.effects: If you or the allied champion on your team score a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion, you are both {{tip|heal|healed}} for {{as|18% of the taken down target's '''maximum''' health}}.

passives.name: The Bomb
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage against enemy champions marks them for 3 seconds, storing 20% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt against them, increased to 25% if they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}. Each instance of ability damage dealt to a marked target refreshes their mark. Once the mark expires, it detonates to deal {{as|true damage}} equal to the amount stored against the target. If a mark would deal lethal damage to the target, it is detonated immediately.

passives.name: Reverberate
passives.effects: After 2 seconds from the start of the combat phase in each round, gain {{as|5 '''bonus''' health}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.

passives.name: Resonate
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 2% of your '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

passives.name: Rumble
passives.effects: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} an enemy champion generates 25 stacks of ''Reverberation'' for 10 seconds, stacking up to 100 times and refreshing on-hit as well as on subsequent immobilizations. At '''maximum''' stacks and upon {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} an enemy, your on-hit effects are applied to them 3 times.

passives.name: End the Line
passives.effects: At the start of the combat phase in each round, declare the enemy champion with the lowest {{as|'''total maximum''' health}} as the ''Regent''. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against the ''Regent'' for the first time in the combat phase grants you {{as|10 '''bonus''' attack damage}} permanently and sets the '''current''' cooldown of your ultimate ability to {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

passives.name: Between the Ribs
passives.effects: You can now identify the ''Weakpoints'' of nearby enemy champions, marked as an arc around them and pointing towards a specific direction. ''Weakpoints'' on targets take 4 seconds to become exposed and linger for {{fd|11.25}} seconds afterwards. Dealing damage in the direction of an exposed ''Weakpoint'' will consume it to deal {{as|'''bonus''' true damage}} equal to {{as|3%|hp}} {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AD)}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of the target's '''maximum''' health}} and grant you {{as|{{pp|15 to 60|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Once a target's ''Weakpoint'' is consumed or expires, you identify a new ''Weakpoint'' on them.

passives.name: Spark
passives.effects: Basic attacks and ability hits against enemies inflicts them with a {{as|Burn}} that deals{{ft|{{as|{{pp|200 to 450}} magic damage}} over 3 seconds.|{{as|{{pp|200/12 to 450/12}} magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over 3 seconds.}}

passives.name: Cleansing Flame
passives.effects:
Inflicting an enemy champion with a {{as|Burn|buzzword3}} effect releases a fireball from the target, landing to a location near you after {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Upon landing, a blaze is created at the impact area with a radius of 175 units, lasting for 5 seconds (3 second cooldown per target). While you are within the blaze, gain {{as|20% '''bonus total''' movement speed}}, lingering for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after exiting, and {{sti|heal}} for {{pp|60 to 150}} upon entering and each second of the blaze's lifetime thereafter. While enemies are within the blaze, they are dealt {{as|100 magic damage}} every second.

For each unique {{as|Burn|buzzword3}} effect source that you have, increase the blaze's size by 40 units (up to 6 times), and its strength by {{as|4% '''bonus total''' movement speed}} and {{as|30|hsp}} healing per second for the buff and {{as|60 magic damage}} per tick for the enemy effect (all up to 10 times).

passives.name: Call Lightning
passives.effects: {{as|Automatically|river}} summon a storm cloud above you, which strikes a lightning bolt at your current location after {{fd|1.5}} seconds to deal {{as|{{pp|135 to 230}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow}} them by 30% for 2 seconds. If you are within the lightning strike, gain a {{tip|shield}} equal to {{as|14% of your '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}} for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Fully Automated
passives.effects: {{as|Automatic|river}} effects have their cooldown reduced by 1 second and now benefit from your {{as|ability haste}}. ''Call Lightning's'' cooldown cannot be reduced below 5 seconds by this effect.

passives.name: Reach Weapon
passives.effects: Gain {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' attack range}}.

passives.name: Sweet Spot
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{pp|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 1000|key=%|type=distance|label1=units}} increased damage and abilities deal {{pp|0 to 40 for 11|0 to 1000|key=%|type=distance|label1=units}} increased damage. The distance is calculated from your {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} current position to the target's position when the triggering attack or ability hits them.

passives.name: The Path Between
passives.effects:
If you have at least {{as|130 '''bonus''' attack damage}} and {{as|180 ability power}}, enter either the ''Material World'' or the ''Spirit World'', determined randomly, at the start of the combat phase in each round:

'''Material World''': Increase your {{as|attack damage}} by 20% and gain {{as|{{pp|50 to 150|key=%}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
'''Spirit World''': Increase your {{as|ability power}} by 20% and gain {{as|{{pp|30 to 120}} ability haste}}.

passives.name: Accretion
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects against enemy champions generate 1 and 5 stacks of ''Accretion'', respectively, up to 50. For each ''Accretion'' stack, gain {{as|10% '''base''' health regeneration}}, up to {{as|500% '''base''' health regeneration}} at '''maximum''' stacks. Additionally, for every 10 ''Accretion'' stacks, gain 20% increased size, up to 100% at '''maximum''' stacks. Stacks are reset every round and between each phase in a round.

active.name: Dark Star
active.effects: Summon a black hole at the target location after a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay that lasts for 2 {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 100 '''bonus''' health)}} seconds and has a radius of [{{tip|cr|icononly=true}} {{tt|225|Total radius}} / {{tt|75|Impassable horizon radius}} units]{{times}}champion size modifier (+ {{fd|0.1}}% per ''Accretion'' stack). Enemies within are dealt {{as|{{pp|30 to 100}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|6.5}}% of user's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} every second, {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 35%, and {{tip|kinematics|dragged}} inward until they reach the horizon at the center. Additionally, for each enemy champion inside the black hole, generate 1 stack of ''Accretion'' per second.

passives.name: Pull Their Strings
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against enemy champions apply a ''Puppeteer'' stack for 15 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. The fourth stack against a target consumes them all to render the target {{tip|berserk}} for 2 seconds, causing them to gain {{as|50%|as}} {{as|(+ 150% of your heal and shield power)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} and {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}} (25 second cooldown). If only one champion is alive on the enemy team, instead {{tip|fear}} the target for the same duration.
Granting yourself or an ally a {{tip|heal}}, {{tip|shield}}, or [[champion ability|ability-sourced]] buff reduces the cooldown of ''Pull Their Strings'' by 5 seconds, once per cast.
